citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on
27-Feb-18. I called the licensee's contact number and waited in the driveway for 30 minutes before leaving the
facility.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on
27-Feb-18.  I called the licensee's contact number and waited in the driveway for 30 minutes before leaving the
facility.  
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
